message.content:
cs.PF, cs.AR, cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.PL

Reasoning: 
- cs.PF (Performance): The paper focuses on evaluating the performance benefits of using multiple streams on a heterogeneous platform, specifically the Intel Xeon Phi. 
- cs.AR (Architecture): The paper discusses the architecture of the Intel Xeon Phi and how multiple streams can be used to improve performance. 
- cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing): The paper discusses parallel computing on a heterogeneous platform and how multiple streams can be used to improve performance. 
- cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms): The paper briefly mentions the use of heuristics to reduce the search space when determining a proper task granularity and resource granularity. 
- cs.PL (Programming Languages): The paper discusses the use of multiple streams in real-world applications and how it can be implemented in programming languages.
